QuestData.Title: Wisp in the Willows
QuestData.Description: Wisps are the spirits of our night elven brethren who have become one with the forest. But their minds and the way they perceive things are very different than in life.$b$bYou should bond with this little one. See through its eyes as it travels to the hidden pools and grows some trees.
QuestData.LogDescription: Guide the Wisp through the Hidden Pools to grow $2oa trees.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you traveler! You have truly helped the forest today.
